game.name: Airline Ops
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build your airline empire. Earn Elite Operator Status, unlock the Gold A380, and roll collectible aircraft — from aviation legends to the downright impossible. Includes 373+ aircraft types and 4,878 airports in early access.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your airline empire. Earn Elite Operator Status, unlock the Gold A380, and roll collectible aircraft — from aviation legends to the downright impossible. Includes 373+ aircraft types and 4,878 airports in early access.
